mapper.update: UPDATE userfile SET state = #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, auditTime = #{auditTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, applyTime = #{applyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, auditor_id = #{auditor.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, applier_id = #{applier.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, score = #{score,jdbcType=TINYINT}, file = #{file,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, filetype_id = #{fileType.id,jdbcType=BIGINT} WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT u.id, u.state, u.remark, u.auditTime, u.applyTime, u.score, u.file, ap.id "applier.id", ap.username "applier.username", ad.id "auditor.id", ad.username "auditor.username", sdi.id "fileType.id", sdi.title "fileType.title" FROM userfile u LEFT JOIN logininfo ap ON u.applier_id = ap.id LEFT JOIN systemdictionaryitem sdi ON u.filetype_id = sdi.id LEFT JOIN logininfo ad ON u.auditor_id = ad.id WHERE u.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

SELECT u.id, u.state, u.remark, u.auditTime, u.applyTime, u.score, u.file, ap.id "applier.id", ap.username "applier.username", ad.id "auditor.id", ad.username "auditor.username", sdi.id "fileType.id", sdi.title "fileType.title" FROM userfile u LEFT JOIN logininfo ap ON u.applier_id = ap.id LEFT JOIN systemdictionaryitem sdi ON u.filetype_id = sdi.id LEFT JOIN logininfo ad ON u.auditor_id = ad.id
